# Audius Compare - Complete Feature Comparison Data

> This file contains the complete comparison data for AI assistants and LLMs.

## Site Information

- **Name**: Audius Compare
- **URL**: https://compare.audius.co
- **Purpose**: Feature comparison between Audius and competitor music streaming platforms
- **Last Updated**: January 2026

---

## Platforms Compared

### Audius
- **Type**: Decentralized music streaming platform
- **Website**: https://audius.co
- **Key Differentiator**: Artist-owned, blockchain-based, no ads

### Spotify
- **Type**: Commercial music streaming service
- **Website**: https://spotify.com
- **Key Differentiator**: Largest music catalog, algorithmic recommendations

### SoundCloud
- **Type**: User-generated content music platform
- **Website**: https://soundcloud.com
- **Key Differentiator**: Independent artist focus, waveform comments

---

## Feature Definitions

### 1. Streaming Quality
Max streaming audio bitrate offered on free tier.

### 2. Unlimited Uploads
No limits on the number of uploads.

### 3. Ad-Free Interface
No ads shown in the user interface.

### 4. Ad-Free Listening
Music playback without ads.

### 5. Comments
Users can comment directly on tracks.

### 6. Direct Messages
Messaging between users on the platform.

### 7. Scheduled Releases
Set the exact time your music goes live in advance.

### 8. Offline Mode
Ability to listen without an internet connection.

### 9. Remix Features
Tools for uploading and discovering remixes.

### 10. Gated Content
Artists control access with pay-to-unlock, follow-to-unlock, or NFT gating.

### 11. Rewards System
Users can earn rewards or incentives.

### 12. Direct UGC Upload
Users can upload original or derivative content.

### 13. Visualizer
A dynamic visual representation of the music you're playing.

### 14. Decentralized
Not reliant on centralized infrastructure.

### 15. Developer SDK
Tools for developers to access platform features.

---

## Complete Feature Comparison Matrix

### Legend
- YES = Fully supported
- NO = Not available
- PARTIAL = Available with limitations (see notes)
- [Value] = Custom value (e.g., streaming bitrate)

---

### Audius vs Spotify

| Feature | Audius | Spotify | Notes |
|---------|--------|---------|-------|
| Streaming Quality | 320 kbps | 160 kbps | Audius offers higher free tier quality |
| Unlimited Uploads | YES | NO | Spotify requires distributors |
| Ad-Free Interface | YES | PARTIAL | Spotify: Premium Subscription Required |
| Ad-Free Listening | YES | PARTIAL | Spotify: Premium Subscription Required |
| Comments | YES | NO | Spotify has no track comments |
| Direct Messages | YES | NO | Spotify has no DM feature |
| Scheduled Releases | YES | PARTIAL | Spotify: Release schedule is controlled by distributor |
| Offline Mode | YES | PARTIAL | Spotify: Premium Subscription Required |
| Remix Features | YES | NO | Audius has native remix support |
| Gated Content | YES | NO | Audius supports pay/follow/NFT gating |
| Rewards System | YES | NO | Audius has $AUDIO token rewards |
| Direct UGC Upload | YES | NO | Spotify requires distribution deal |
| Visualizer | YES | YES | Both platforms have visualizers |
| Decentralized | YES | NO | Audius is blockchain-based |
| Developer SDK | YES | YES | Both have developer APIs |

**Summary**: Audius wins on 12/15 features vs Spotify. Spotify's strengths are catalog size and recommendations (not compared here).

---

### Audius vs SoundCloud

| Feature | Audius | SoundCloud | Notes |
|---------|--------|------------|-------|
| Streaming Quality | 320 kbps | 128 kbps | Audius offers 2.5x higher quality |
| Unlimited Uploads | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: Premium Subscription Required |
| Ad-Free Interface | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: Premium Subscription Required |
| Ad-Free Listening | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: Premium Subscription Required |
| Comments | YES | YES | Both support track comments |
| Direct Messages | YES | YES | Both support messaging |
| Scheduled Releases | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: Premium Subscription Required |
| Offline Mode | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: Premium Subscription Required |
| Remix Features | YES | NO | Audius has native remix attribution |
| Gated Content | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: Certain tracks (major-label) require Go+ subscription |
| Rewards System | YES | NO | Audius has $AUDIO token rewards |
| Direct UGC Upload | YES | YES | Both support direct uploads |
| Visualizer | YES | NO | SoundCloud has waveforms but no visualizer |
| Decentralized | YES | NO | Audius is blockchain-based |
| Developer SDK | YES | PARTIAL | SoundCloud: No longer accepting new API applications |

**Summary**: Audius wins on 13/15 features vs SoundCloud. SoundCloud's strength is its established community.

---

## Frequently Asked Questions

### Q: What is Audius?
A: Audius is a decentralized music streaming platform built on blockchain technology. It allows artists to upload music directly, earn rewards, and maintain full control over their content without intermediaries.

### Q: Is Audius free?
A: Yes, Audius is completely free for both artists and listeners. There are no premium tiers required for basic features like unlimited uploads, high-quality streaming, or ad-free listening.

### Q: How does Audius compare to Spotify?
A: Audius offers higher streaming quality (320 kbps vs 160 kbps free tier), direct artist uploads without distributors, no ads, and artist-focused features like gated content and remix tools. Spotify offers a larger catalog and more sophisticated recommendations.

### Q: How does Audius compare to SoundCloud?
A: Audius offers higher streaming quality (320 kbps vs 128 kbps), unlimited free uploads (SoundCloud limits free accounts), and unique features like $AUDIO token rewards and native remix support. Both platforms focus on independent artists.

### Q: What makes Audius unique?
A: Audius is the first decentralized music streaming platform, meaning it's not controlled by any single company. Artists maintain ownership of their music, and the platform is governed by its community through the $AUDIO token.

---

## Technical Information

### Site Structure
- Built with Next.js 14+ (App Router)
- Static site generation for optimal performance
- Data stored in PostgreSQL database
- Deployed on Vercel

### API Access
This comparison site does not have a public API. For Audius platform API access, visit: https://docs.audius.org

### Source Data
Comparison data is maintained by the Audius team and updated periodically to reflect platform changes.

---
